front.title: Transport Layer Security (TLS) Authorization Using KeyNote

abstract.t: This document specifies the use of the KeyNote trust-management system as an authorization extension in the Transport Layer Security (TLS) Handshake Protocol, according to [AUTHZ]. Extensions carried in the client and server hello messages confirm that both parties support the desired authorization data types. Then, if supported by both the client and the server, KeyNote credentials are exchanged during the supplemental data handshake message.
